taskbody.prereq: Before you go watching wild ducks, make sure you know what a wild duck looks like.

context.p: Watching wild ducks can be calming and recreational.
Read this to learn more about what you need to have a satisfying duck-watching experience.

step.cmd: Choose a location to watch ducks.
step.info: Generally, ducks are found in wild locations, near water.

step.cmd: Pick a field guide to identify the ducks.

choices.choice: Many modern duck watchers rely on the Sibley guide.
A traditional favorite is the Peterson guide.

chrow.chdesc: Wide field of view, allows quick observations

step.cmd: When you have definitively identified a duck, make a note in your guide.

stepresult.p: You'll now have a record you can keep for the rest of your life.

stepsection.p: Once youâ€™ve identified the duck, you can spend some time noting its behavior.

step.note: Don't disturb the ducks while observing their behavior. They behave differently if they detect your presence.
step.cmd: Watch how the ducks interact with one another or what they're eating.
